page.title: 15Buildings
page.content: {HOUSING:}There is a large variety of housing in Aston. There are council houses in Stringers Lane,Aston End rd, and Benington rd. Yoemans Drive has large modern detatched designer built houses,also a clock tower dating from 1846.Broadwater Lane has small modern detached houses, a large victorian ho_ use(which a vicar had built for his two daughters,complete with a bell wh_ ich they rang if they needed his help) and other cottages dating from 1562. Aston Dene manor house,a magnificent georgian style building set in it's own grounds behind St.Mary's Church (dating from 1272).{PUBS:}The Pig and Whistle,Rose and Crown,The Crown,(As_ ton End).{FARMS:}Astonbury Farm(dairy and wheat),Lords Farm(livery),Devroes (battery hens).{SHOPS:}General Stores & Post Office,Antique shop.{OTHER:}A school and a village hall.
